hero.title: APOLO 27
hero.description: We are a team of students from INTEC, Dominican Republic, competing in the NASA Human Exploration Rover Challenge. Second place worldwide in 2024 and the first Latin American team to reach the podium. We design and build rovers for future space exploration.

sponsors.subtitle: Driving our mission

social.description: Be part of our community and join us as we take the Dominican Republic to space
